item.title: PrestaShop margin size on delivery slips
item.description: Recently one of my clients contacted me asking if I can make a change. Shrink a little bit huge margins on PDF delivery slips. The task wasn’t easy because settings is bit hidden in the files. By modifying templates you can change font size, and amend or remove elements from the printout. Unfortunately you can’t actually decrease margin on PDF printout.
